subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[chase]] after; to [[pursue]] (someone)
# to [[hunt]]; to [[track]]
# to [[pursue]] ([[fame]], etc.); to [[seek]]
#: {{zh-x|追夢|to chase one's dreams}}
# {{lb|zh|specifically}} to [[woo]]; to [[chase]]; to [[court]]
# to [[recall]]; to [[recollect]]
# to [[do]] something as a [[make up|make-up]] [[measure]]
# to [[get to the bottom of]]; to [[look into]] and [[find out]]
# to [[expel]]

{{attention|zh|what about as in 追剧}}
